detaileddescription.para: Record access control point CCC descriptor
Record access control point CCC descriptor
List of characteristics to be discovered; order matches handle index enumeration

briefdescription.para: Process a message received from the sensor on the record access control point.

Perform service and characteristic discovery for Glucose service. Parameter pHdlList must point to an array of length GLPC_GLS_HDL_LIST_LEN. If discovery is successful the handles of discovered characteristics and descriptors will be set in pHdlList.

detaileddescription.para: Perform service and characteristic discovery for Glucose service. Parameter pHdlList must point to an array of length GLPC_GLS_HDL_LIST_LEN. If discovery is successful the handles of discovered characteristics and descriptors will be set in pHdlList.

briefdescription.para: Process a value received in an ATT read response, notification, or indication message. Parameter pHdlList must point to an array of length GLPC_GLS_HDL_LIST_LEN. If the attribute handle of the message matches a handle in the handle list the value is processed, otherwise it is ignored.

detaileddescription.para: Process a value received in an ATT read response, notification, or indication message. Parameter pHdlList must point to an array of length GLPC_GLS_HDL_LIST_LEN. If the ATT handle of the message matches a handle in the handle list the value is processed, otherwise it is ignored.

simplesect.para: ATT_SUCCESS if handle is found, ATT_ERR_NOT_FOUND otherwise.

memberdef.argsstring: (dmConnId_t connId, uint16_t handle, uint8_t opcode, uint8_t oper, glpcFilter_t *pFilter)
memberdef.name: GlpcGlsRacpSend

briefdescription.para: Send a command to the glucose service record access control point.

parameterdescription.para: Command operator or 0 if no operator required.
Command filter parameters or NULL of no parameters required.

briefdescription.para: Set the last received glucose measurement sequence number.
Get the last received glucose measurement sequence number.

simplesect.para: Last received glucose measurement sequence number.
